comment._content: Rather dull photo when compared to Henry King's - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2666190207/

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: The statue of Sir Henry Parkes appears to have been added to its Gresham St niche at the Lands Office building (near the Bridge/Gresham St corner) some time after August 1901...and maybe not until well into 1902... Parkes appears to have still been a clay model in August 1901 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article71470532 See my Lands Office statue comments at www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/5401920179/
